title: Ytisf/theZoo: A repository of Live malwares for your own joy and pleasure
author: rbanffy
content: readme.md thezoo is project created make possibility malware analysis open available the public. since have found that almost versions malware are very hard come in way will allow analysis, have decided gather of for in accessible safe .thezoo was born yuval tisf nativ is maintained shahak shalev.thezoo is open welcoming visitors!disclaimerthezoo's purpose is allow study malware enable who are interested malware analysis ( maybe as part their job) have access live malware, analyse ways operate, maybe enable advanced savvy to block specific malware within own environment.please remember these are live dangerous malware! come encrypted locked a reason! not run unless are absolutely sure what are doing! are be used for educational purposes ( we mean !) !!!we recommend running in vm has internet connection ( an internal virtual network you must) without guest additions any equivalents. of are worms will automatically try spread . running unconstrained means you infect yourself others vicious dangerous malware!!!gpl 3thezoo - most awesome free malware database the aircopyright (c) 2015, yuval nativ, lahad ludar, 5fingers program is free software: can redistribute and/ modify under terms the gnu general public license published the free software foundation, either version 3 the license, (at option) later version. program is distributed the hope it be useful, without warranty; without the implied warranty merchantability fitness a particular purpose. thegnu general public license more details. should received copy the gnu general public licensealong this program. not, http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.documentation notesbackground:thezoo's objective is offer fast easy of retrieving malware samples source code an organized fashion hopes promoting malware research.root files:since version 0.42 thezoo has been undergoing dramatic changes. now runs both cli argvs modes. can call program the same command line arguments before. current default state thezoo runtime is cli. following files directories are responsible the application's behaviour./conf conf folder holds files relevant the particular running the program are part the application. can find eula file the conf more./importscontains .py .pyc import files used the rest the application/malwares/binaries actual malwares samples - careful!/malware/sourcemalware source code :)directory structure:each directory is composed 4 files:malware files an encrypted zip archive.sha256 sum the 1st file.md5 sum the 1st file.password file the archive.structure maldb.dbmaldb.db is db thezoo is acting upon find malware indexed your drive. structure is follows:uid,location,type,name,version,author,language,date,architecture,platform,comments,tagsuid -determined based the indexing process.location - location the drive the malware have searched .type-sorts different types malware are. far sort :virus, trojans, botnets, ransomware, spywarename- the name the malware.version-nothing say here well.author-... 'm that documentation...programming language - state the malware regard source, bin, which type source. c/cpp/bin...date- 'author' section.architecture - arch platform was build . can x86, x64, arm7....platform - win32, win64, *nix32, *nix64, ios, android so .comments - comments may about item.tags - tags matching item. example line look follow:104,source/original/dexter,trojan,dexter,2,unknown,c,00/05/2013,x86,win32,null,sourcebugs reports repository holding files is currentlyhttps://github.com/ytisf/thezoochange log v0.60: moved db sqlite3. searching overhaul a freestyle fashion. fixed "" command. more & more malwares.change log v0.50: better easier ui. aligned printing malwares. command line arguments are working. added 10 more malwares (cool ones) the db.change log v0.42: fix eula proper disclaimer. more precise searching indexing including platform more. added 10 malwares. git update platform new malware. fix display search. enable support platform architecture indexing. separate between database application. ui improvements.change log v0.43: verify argv be working properly. (fixes v0.5) virus-total upload indexing module. - possible due restrictions vt. automatic reporting system malwares are indexed the framework.change log v0.50: malware analysis pack has been removed reduce clone size. more documentation has been added. removed debugging function were dead the code.predicted change log v1.0 fix auto-complete malware frameworks. (thanks 5fingers) consider changing db xml sqlite3. (sheksa - done :)) move malwares another repo. better ui features. you any suggestions malware you indexed ( the manner laid in documentation) please send to to - yuval[]morirt [dot]com - we add for everyones enjoyment.
